column5: I know theres been multiple posts on this subject, I am about to renew my boat insurance and remembered there were a number of OFC`ers that were in the buisiness, If someone is in the GTA and interested in quoting my needs shoot me a PM and ill give you the details and my current quoted rate,  Cheers  Ian
Are you just adding it to your homeowners or renters insurance?  Joey
actually Im in the same market in mississauga shoot me a pm also please

I would be interested in a quote as well - as long as they carry: #1) Car x2 #2)  Boat #3)  House #4)  Camping Trailer ( 30' ) #5)  Park Trailer ( 38 x12 ) #6)  Atv #7)  Golf Cart   -  Thats depressing!  I just realized that I work to pay insurance!  I Can't afford to fish!   Don
Thanks Joey, I am looking for a stand alone marine insurance, dont want it with car or house.
